price: Hakika walio amini na wakatenda mema watakuwa nazo Bustani za neema.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ لَهُمۡ جَنَّٰتُ ٱلنَّعِيمِ
footnotes: Hakika walio amini na wakatenda vitendo vyema watapata Bustani zenye neema.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti lahum jannātu al-naʿīmi
